post_content: I am interested in buying PSA 4 or above or SGC 4.5 or above T206 cards.  Interested in all the SLs, commons, and even some of the rare ones.  I am trying to complete the set at a fairly high grade.  Please message if you have cards that you are interested in selling.  Thanks.
I have several hundred PSA 4+ commons along with some HOFers and SLers.  Email me your needs at [url]bkrumwiede@comcast.net[/url] and we can work on a deal.
I have several SGC 4.5+, PM sent
